sentence.english: She wears red lipstick every day.
sentence.spanish: Ella usa lápiz labial rojo todos los días.

sentence.english: We are painting the bedroom blue this weekend.
sentence.spanish: Estamos pintando la habitación de azul este fin de semana.

sentence.english: They bought a green car last month.
sentence.spanish: Ellos compraron un coche verde el mes pasado.

sentence.english: I love yellow flowers in the garden.
sentence.spanish: Me encantan las flores amarillas en el jardín.

sentence.english: He is wearing an orange jumper today.
sentence.spanish: Él lleva puesto un jersey naranja hoy.

sentence.english: You chose purple curtains for the living room.
sentence.spanish: Tú elegiste cortinas moradas para la sala de estar.

sentence.english: It is getting dark and the sky turns pink.
sentence.spanish: Está anocheciendo y el cielo se vuelve rosa.

sentence.english: My dog has beautiful brown eyes.
sentence.spanish: Mi perro tiene hermosos ojos marrones.

sentence.english: She always drinks her coffee black.
sentence.spanish: Ella siempre toma su café negro.

sentence.english: They are buying a white sofa for their new flat.
sentence.spanish: Ellos están comprando un sofá blanco para su nuevo piso.

sentence.english: He wore a grey suit to the interview yesterday.
sentence.spanish: Él llevó un traje gris a la entrevista ayer.

sentence.english: We prefer beige walls in our house.
sentence.spanish: Nosotros preferimos paredes beis en nuestra casa.

sentence.english: I am looking for a turquoise dress for the party.
sentence.spanish: Estoy buscando un vestido turquesa para la fiesta.

sentence.english: They painted the front door maroon last summer.
sentence.spanish: Ellos pintaron la puerta principal de granate el verano pasado.

sentence.english: She loves the lilac blossoms in spring.
sentence.spanish: A ella le encantan las flores lila en primavera.
